home.missionDesc: Empowering communities through advocacy, education, and action
home.missionText: To support vulnerable families, orphans, widows, and disadvantaged households through comprehensive programs that restore dignity, provide emergency relief, promote education, strengthen moral values, and empower communities for self-reliance.
home.visionDesc: Rights of children equally provided and respected
home.visionText: A community where vulnerable families have access to social protection, emergency relief, quality education, spiritual guidance, and empowerment opportunities for sustainable development.
home.impactIntro: Through our core programs - social protection, emergency relief, education, faith-based initiatives, women & youth empowerment, and family protection - we're making a significant impact in communities across Rwanda.
home.studentsSupported: Students in Rwamagana School Each Year
home.futureDesc: A future where every child grows up in dignity, every woman lives free from violence, and every family has the stability and knowledge to build a better tomorrow.

hero.slide1Subtitle: Providing immediate humanitarian assistance during crises, disasters, and urgent community needs to ensure rapid response and recovery.
hero.slide2Subtitle: We implement comprehensive programs including social protection, emergency relief, education, faith-based initiatives, women & youth empowerment, and family protection to support vulnerable communities.
hero.slide3Subtitle: Through our core programs, we restore dignity and stability to vulnerable families, provide emergency assistance, promote education, strengthen moral values, and empower women and youth for self-reliance.

programs.title: What we do
programs.subtitle: Through our diverse range of programs, we address countless challenges, resources, and opportunities to create lasting impact in communities.
programs.socialProtectionDesc: Supporting vulnerable families, orphans, widows, and disadvantaged households to restore dignity and stability through comprehensive assistance and community support.
programs.emergencyReliefDesc: Providing immediate humanitarian assistance during crises, disasters, and urgent community needs to ensure rapid response and recovery.
programs.educationDesc: Promoting access to education, vocational training, and life skills development for children and youth to build sustainable futures.
programs.faithBasedDesc: Strengthening moral values, spiritual resilience, and ethical leadership through religious teachings and counseling for community transformation.
programs.womenYouthDesc: Equipping women and young people with skills, resources, and opportunities for self-reliance and economic independence.
programs.familyProtectionDesc: Protecting the family unit by addressing the root causes of divorce through religious teachings, counseling, dialogue, and family mediation.

footer.description: Umbrella for Vulnerable implements social protection, emergency relief, education, faith-based, women & youth empowerment, and family protection programs to support vulnerable families and communities.
footer.socialMediaText: Follow us on social media to stay updated on our programs, impact stories, and ways to get involved.
footer.copyright: Â© 2026 Umbrella for Vulnerable. All rights reserved.

contact.getInTouchDesc: We're here to help and answer any question you might have. We look forward to hearing from you!
contact.name: Name

aboutUs.title: Support Umbrella for Vulnerable?
aboutUs.description: Because we know that even the best programs are only as good as the people behind them. That's why we offer comprehensive support, community empowerment, and sustainable solutions that create lasting impact in vulnerable communities across Rwanda.

programsPage.directAssistanceDesc: Providing immediate support to vulnerable families including food, shelter, and basic necessities

programsPage.communityIntegrationDesc: Connecting vulnerable families with community support networks and resources
programsPage.emergencyReliefDesc: Providing immediate humanitarian assistance during crises, disasters, and urgent community needs to ensure rapid response and recovery.

programsPage.womenYouthDesc: Equipping women and young people with skills, resources, and opportunities for self-reliance and economic independence.
programsPage.familyProtectionDesc: Protecting the family unit by addressing the root causes of divorce through religious teachings, counseling, dialogue, and family mediation.
programsPage.familyProtectionDesc2: We provide comprehensive family counseling, conflict resolution services, and educational programs to strengthen family bonds and prevent family breakdown.

aboutPage.heroDesc: Supporting vulnerable communities through comprehensive programs
aboutPage.missionText1: At Umbrella for Vulnerable, we implement comprehensive programs including social protection, emergency relief, education, faith-based initiatives, women & youth empowerment, and family protection to support vulnerable families and communities.
aboutPage.missionText2: Through our work across different communities, we have witnessed the everyday struggles vulnerable families face, and we are committed to addressing these challenges through coordinated and comprehensive support programs.
aboutPage.visionText: A community where vulnerable families have access to social protection, emergency relief, quality education, spiritual guidance, and empowerment opportunities for sustainable development and self-reliance.
aboutPage.povertyDesc: Extreme poverty affecting vulnerable families, orphans, widows, and disadvantaged households
aboutPage.emergencyDesc: Natural disasters, crises, and urgent community needs requiring immediate humanitarian response
aboutPage.opportunitiesDesc: Lack of access to education, vocational training, and economic empowerment opportunities
aboutPage.responseText1: These challenges require comprehensive, coordinated responses that address both immediate needs and long-term development. Our approach combines direct assistance with capacity building and empowerment.
aboutPage.responseText2: We implement six core programs that work together to provide holistic support: social protection, emergency relief, education, faith-based initiatives, women & youth empowerment, and family protection programs.
aboutPage.integrityDesc: Upholding honesty and transparency in all our work
aboutPage.compassionDesc: Showing empathy and care for every family we serve
aboutPage.communityDesc: Building strong partnerships and local engagement
aboutPage.empowermentDesc: Equipping communities with knowledge and tools
aboutPage.partnersDesc: We collaborate with these amazing organizations to create lasting impact in communities across Rwanda.
